about_the_game:
Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator

Step into the driver’s seat this holiday season with Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator, a unique and thrilling blend of precision driving and festive fun! As a daring delivery driver, your mission is simple but challenging: bring Christmas joy to everyone by delivering gifts across snowy towns, icy mountain roads, and picturesque winter villages. But there’s a twist—style matters, and you’ll need to drift your way to success!

Key Features:
Drift Through Winter Wonderlands: Navigate through beautifully crafted snowy environments, complete with twinkling lights, cozy cabins, and festive decorations. Each level is filled with unique obstacles and tricky turns that will test your driving and drifting skills.

Deliver Gifts on Time: The clock is ticking! Your deliveries are on a tight schedule, and only the most skilled drivers will get the job done without missing a beat. Stay sharp and keep the holiday spirit alive!

Customize Your Rides: Choose from a variety of vehicles and customize them to suit your style. Upgrade your car’s performance, add festive touches like holiday lights and candy cane decals, and make your delivery sleigh stand out!

Challenging Gameplay: Experience a mix of realistic driving mechanics and arcade-style fun. Each level ramps up the difficulty, introducing new challenges like slippery ice, steep slopes, and tight urban streets.

Festive Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in the magic of the holidays with cheerful music, a warm festive vibe, and delightful surprises around every corner.

Whether you’re a drift enthusiast or simply looking for a lighthearted holiday adventure, Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator will keep you entertained and in the holiday spirit. Deliver joy, conquer the snow, and prove you’re the ultimate Christmas delivery champion!

name: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 6 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 8 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator Experience the ultimate holiday challenge! Drift through snowy roads, deliver gifts on time, and conquer festive obstacles in this fun, fast-paced driving simulator. Customize your vehicle, master tricky routes, and spread Christmas cheer like never before!
